item.description:
Come meet the other members of the group, meet new people and have fun answering questions about anything and everything. Even if you think you're no good at trivia, you'll probably know something the rest of us don't, join us! The competition is getting better, we need your trivia skills!

The Trivia game starts at 9PM and goes to 11.

I will be taking photos of the teams. Our group, for having existed for over a year has very few photos...lets fix that!

We're getting close to having another dinner and karaoke night to use up the gift certificates the group has been winning.

This will be the last Monday Night Trivia at Fatty McGee's, the bar is discontinuing the Trivia, what with football season starting and generally low turnouts.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be carrying a bike helmet and have a meetup sign.
item.name: Monday Night Trivia @ Fatty McGees
